ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have hatched a mighty plot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they contrived a plot of great magnitude,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They contrived a plot of great magnitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have arrogantly plotted evil plans against me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And they carried out a very sinister scheme.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they have plotted a mighty plot."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they have planned a very great plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and have devised a mighty device
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they have plotted a mighty plot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they have hatched a mighty plot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And who have plotted a tremendous plot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they have devised an outrageous plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they have plotted a mighty plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they have devised a mighty plot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:22] And they have devised, namely, the leaders, a mighty plot, extremely outrageous, by denying Noah and harming him as well as his followers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they have plotted a mighty plot) and they have uttered a tremendous lie,
